name: @Shift_Volume
author: AFNI Developers
description: Tool to shift a dataset in the RAI coordinate system or between MNI anatomical space and MNI space.

inputs.description: Move dataset by dR, dA, dI mm (RAI coordinate system)
inputs.name: RAI Shift Vector

inputs.description: Move dataset from MNI Anatomical space to MNI space (equivalent to -rai_shift 0 -4 -5)
inputs.name: MNI Anatomical to MNI Space

inputs.description: Move dataset from MNI space to MNI Anatomical space (equivalent to -rai_shift 0 4 5)
inputs.name: MNI to MNI Anatomical Space

inputs.description: Input dataset, typically an anatomical dataset to be aligned to BASE.
inputs.name: Input Dataset

inputs.description: Do not create new data, shift the existing ones (use with caution).
inputs.name: No Copy Flag
